languages.text: "Я знаю". {n}В словах нет ни гордости, ни вины, одна только отрешенность, граничащая с полным эмоциональным опустошением.{/n}
"I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я знаю". {n}В словах нет ни гордости, ни вины, одна только отрешенность, граничащая с полным эмоциональным опустошением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}
"I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}
"I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}

"I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}
"I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}

languages.text: 「わかっています」{n}彼の声には誇りも罪悪感もなかった。そこにあるのは、感情の空白に近い、冷淡さだけが残っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「わかっています」{n}彼の声には誇りも罪悪感もなかった。そこにあるのは、感情の空白に近い、冷淡さだけが残っていた。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich weiß." {n}In seiner Stimme liegt kein Stolz, keine Schuld – nur Distanziertheit, fast ein emotionales Vakuum.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß." {n}In seiner Stimme liegt kein Stolz, keine Schuld – nur Distanziertheit, fast ein emotionales Vakuum.{/n}

languages.text: « Je sais. » {n}Vous ne percevez ni fierté ni culpabilité dans sa voix dénuée de toute émotion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je sais. » {n}Vous ne percevez ni fierté ni culpabilité dans sa voix dénuée de toute émotion.{/n}

languages.text: «Lo sé». {n}No hay orgullo ni culpa en su voz, solo una apatía que raya en un vacío emocional absoluto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo sé». {n}No hay orgullo ni culpa en su voz, solo una apatía que raya en un vacío emocional absoluto.{/n}

languages.text: “我知道。”{n}他的声音中没有自豪，也没有愧疚，只有冷漠，几乎不带一丝感情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我知道。”{n}他的声音中没有自豪，也没有愧疚，只有冷漠，几乎不带一丝感情。{/n}

languages.text: "Biliyorum." {n}Ne gurur ne de suçluluk duyuyor. Sesinden tamamen duygusal bir boşluğun çevrelediği bir soğukluk hissediliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I know." {n}There is no pride, no guilt in his voice — only aloofness bordering on total emotional vacuum.{/n}
